messages.title: STRONG OPPOSITION – ONLY THE SNP CAN STOP THE TORIES
messages.content: This General Election is a referendum on Theresa May's government. She wants to weaken all opposition across the UK to drag us out of the Single Market.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the SNP can stop the Tories here.

issues.brexitEurope: This General Election is a referendum on Theresa May's government. She wants to weaken all opposition across the UK to drag us out of the Single Market. Whether you voted Remain or Leave in the EU referendum, we now need the best deal for Scotland. We will fight for our pensioners, our universities, and NHS in the Brexit negotiations.
issues.governance: Our group of MPs has been the real opposition at Westminster since 2015. We want to continue that job.
issues.health: We will fight for our pensioners, our universities, and NHS in the Brexit negotiations.
issues.socialWelfare: We will fight for our pensioners, our universities, and NHS in the Brexit negotiations.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am your local choice in this election. I've worked and campaigned for local communities here for years. Don't elect another career politician – elect a strong, local champion.

images.caption: Toni Giugliano, SNP Candidate for Edinburgh West
